law.catch_line: Action for recovery of real property -- Fifteen year limitation.
law.text: Subject to KRS 411.190(8), an action for the recovery of real property may be brought only within fifteen (15) years after the right to institute it first accrued to the plaintiff, or to the person through whom he claims.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 306, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2505.
